member.name: T:SolidEdgeCommunity.ConnectionPointController
member.summary: Default controller that handles connecting\disconnecting to COM events via IConnectionPointContainer and IConnectionPoint interfaces.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.ConnectionPointController.AdviseSink``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Establishes a connection between a connection point object and the client's sink.
member.typeparam: Interface type of the outgoing interface whose connection point object is being requested.
member.param: An object that implements the IConnectionPointContainer inferface.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.ConnectionPointController.IsSinkAdvised``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if a connection between a connection point object and the client's sink is established.
member.param: An object that implements the IConnectionPointContainer inferface.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.ConnectionPointController.UnadviseSink``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Terminates an advisory connection previously established between a connection point object and a client's sink.
member.typeparam: Interface type of the interface whose connection point object is being requested to be removed.
member.param: An object that implements the IConnectionPointContainer inferface.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.ConnectionPointController.UnadviseAllSinks
member.summary: Terminates all advisory connections previously established.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.EventSink`1.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Establishes a connection between a connection point object and the client's sink.
member.param: An event source that implements IConnectionPointContainer.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.EventSink`1.Connect(System.Object)
member.summary: Establishes a connection between a connection point object and the client's sink.
member.param: An event source that implements IConnectionPointContainer.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.EventSink`1.Disconnect
member.summary: Terminates the advisory connection between a connection point and a client's sink.

member.name: T:SolidEdgeCommunity.OleMessageFilter
member.summary: Class that implements the OLE IMessageFilter interface.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.OleMessageFilter.#ctor
member.summary: Private constructor.
member.remarks: Instance of this class is only created by Register().

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.OleMessageFilter.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.OleMessageFilter.Register
member.summary: Registers this instance of IMessageFilter with OLE to handle concurrency issues on the current thread.
member.remarks: Only one message filter can be registered for each thread. Threads in multithreaded apartments cannot have message filters. Thread.CurrentThread.GetApartmentState() must equal ApartmentState.STA. In console applications, this can be achieved by applying the STAThreadAttribute to the Main() method. In WinForm applications, it is default.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.OleMessageFilter.Unregister
member.summary: Unregisters a previous instance of IMessageFilter with OLE on the current thread.
member.remarks: It is not necessary to call Unregister() unless you need to explicitly do so as it is handled in the destructor.

member.summary: Helper class for interaction with Solid Edge.

member.summary: Connects to a running instance of Solid Edge.

member.summary: Connects to or starts a new instance of Solid Edge.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.SolidEdgeUtils.Connect(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Connects to or starts a new instance of Solid Edge.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.SolidEdgeUtils.GetInstalledPath
member.summary: Returns the path to the Solid Edge installation folder.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.SolidEdgeUtils.GetProgramFolderPath
member.summary: Returns the path to the Solid Edge program folder.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.SolidEdgeUtils.GetTrainingFolderPath
member.summary: Returns the path to the Solid Edge training folder.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.SolidEdgeUtils.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns a Version object representing the installed version of Solid Edge.

member.name: M:SolidEdgeCommunity.SolidEdgeUtils.Start
member.summary: Creates and returns a new instance of Solid Edge.
